extendedInfo.description: Get ready to blast off on an epic Running journey with Moon Light RunnerCollect the golden bugs , and avoid enemies to reach to your final destination. And enjoy the Spanish guitar :)Moon Light Runner has got what you need.Tap to jump and collect as many as possible of the golden bugs and try to discover the hidden paths for a higher score.A NEW LEVEL will be added SOON; so stay tuned.**********UPDATE***********A NEW amazing level "LEVEL 6" has been added and unlocked.Added support for high resolution devices.A new type of game play hope you will enjoy it.Please Remember to Rate us so we can continue adding more cool levels for you.If you have ideas you want to see in the next level rate us and write your idea in the review section here. we will try our best to make it happen :)).

reviews.title: very addicitve
reviews.comment: This is a beautiful running game. Great art style. This one is hard to put down since more levels are coming i got to go catch so i will be ready for them!
reviews.author: Sam Wright

reviews.title: Cool and energetic game!!!
reviews.comment: Really nice game with cool music backround! The graphics are awesome!!!! Great job, guys! ;)
reviews.author: Yevgeniya Shatilova

reviews.title: Just needs some work...
reviews.comment: Great graphics. I like the idea of a new levels each week. But the controls are slow and it takes too long to jump so it\'s really inaccurate. The music varies from irritating to fingernails on a chalkboard and doesn\'t match the spooky feel of the graphics. Sorry to be harsh but trying to help.
reviews.author: govegg K

reviews.title: Ok game
reviews.comment: Needs improvement big time. Beautiful graphics tho. Very average. Make this game free.
reviews.author: a.k.a. JHackN

reviews.title: Okay game
reviews.comment: The control response is horrible. However, it has good graphics and music.
reviews.author: ANTONY ND
